info.title: BCNNow Dashboard API
info.description:
Documentation for the BCNNow dashboard API developed as part of the [DECODE](https://decodeproject.eu/) project

# Introduction

This API specification is handle two scenarios:
1. To create a new community in the dashboard (either with encrypted data source or un encrypted data source)
2. To allow login using QR code and Mobile app

# Authentication

The API currently does not require any authentication in order to submit requests.

post.description: This endpoint allows the caller to create a new encrypted dashboard. An encrypted dashboard is one that has an associated keypair, and should only be accessible by users who can prove their membership of the related community via the Coconut protocol.

AuthorizableAttributeID.description: Unique string that identifies an authorizable attribute that has already been registered with the credential issuer

CommunityID.description: Unique string that identifies the community

CommunityName.description: The name of the community - will be shown on the dashboard

CredentialIssuerEndpointAddress.description: URL that points to the credential issuer where the referenced authorizable attribute has been already registered

EncryptedDashboardRequest.description: Request object sent to the dashboard API in order to create a new encrypted dashboard

EncryptedDashboardResponse.description: Response returned on successfully creating an encrypted dashboard

PublicKey.description: The public part of an encryption keypair generated by Zenroom

unEncryptedDashboardResponse.description: Response returned on successfully creating an un encrypted dashboard

ExpiresAfter.description: date in UTC when token expires
